review: I now have a certificate in goat physics.11/10 would buy 300 again

Of of those 'ten minute games', if you really could call it a game.  I reccomend playing it, its not like it costs anything.  I really like the fish tank, it exemplifies the term 'next gen' like nothing else.  Great game to play with your friends.  Great at parties.
